Attribute.Name: updateTransaction
Attribute.Type: enum{Do not update;Only rules and events;Apply WW Style;Create default}
Attribute.Description: Generate a default web form for all transactions used in this instance (to customize the generation, edit the corresponding template).

Attribute.Name: updateWebPanelBC
Attribute.Description: Atualiza WebPanel BC ao aplicar o pattern, somente funciona quando a opção da Configuração Geral WebPanelBCDefault é False

Attribute.Name: afterInsert
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Return to Caller;Go to View;Go to Selection;EnterInUpdate}
Attribute.Description: Action performed after inserting a record. <default> uses configuration file value.

Attribute.Name: afterUpdate
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Return to Caller;Go to View;Go to Selection}
Attribute.Description: Action performed after updating a record. <default> uses configuration file value.

Attribute.Name: afterDelete
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Return to Caller;Go to Selection}
Attribute.Description: Action performed after deleting a record. <default> uses configuration file value.

Attribute.Name: securityId
Attribute.Description: Código de segurança a ser utilizado

Attribute.Name: Enabled
Attribute.Description: Define se gera Documentação ou não

Attribute.Name: ObjectName
Attribute.Description: Define o nome do Objeto

Attribute.Name: ObjectDescription
Attribute.Description: Define a descrição do Objeto

Attribute.Name: SystemDescription
Attribute.Description: Define a descrição do sistema para a Documentação

Attribute.Name: Author
Attribute.Description: Define o autor padrão para a Documentação

Attribute.Name: Date
Attribute.Description: Define a data padrão autor para a Documentação

Attribute.Name: Requirement
Attribute.Description: Define a identificação do Requesito

Attribute.Name: Observation
Attribute.Description: Define a observação para a Documentação

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Action Name

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption (for the button, or for "in grid" actions that do not have an associated image ).

Attribute.Name: gxobject
Attribute.Description: GeneXus object invoked for performing the Action.

Attribute.Name: inGrid
Attribute.Description: True = Action in the grid. False = Action outside the grid. Always false if "MultiRowSelection" is set.

Attribute.Name: multiRowSelection
Attribute.Description: The action applies to multiple rows (a checkbox column will be added to grids).

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid.

Attribute.Name: disabledImage
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid when the action is not enabled (to make the button invisible, use a transparent image).

Attribute.Name: tooltip
Attribute.Description: Tooltip to appear in the grid.

Attribute.Name: condition
Attribute.Description: Condition to determine whether the action will be enabled. If the action is defined as "InGrid", the check will be performed for each record. If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: buttonClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the button (if no class is specified, the one set in the configuration file will be used).

Attribute.Name: EventCode
Attribute.Description: Código para o Evento da Action, somente para Action não Standard

Attribute.Name: CodeEnable
Attribute.Description: Evento adicionado a ação de habilitar a Action, Coringda {0} define o nome do controle

Attribute.Name: Position
Attribute.Description: Define a posição da action fora do Grid

Attribute.Name: Width
Attribute.Description: Define o Width da Coluna no Grid

Attribute.Name: GridWidth
Attribute.Description: Define o Width(tamanho horizontal)

Attribute.Name: GridHeight
Attribute.Description: Define o Height(tamanho vertical)

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Action Name

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption (for the button, or for "in grid" actions that do not have an associated image ).

Attribute.Name: gxobject
Attribute.Description: GeneXus object invoked for performing the Action.

Attribute.Name: inGrid
Attribute.Description: True = Action in the grid. False = Action outside the grid. Always false if "MultiRowSelection" is set.

Attribute.Name: multiRowSelection
Attribute.Description: The action applies to multiple rows (a checkbox column will be added to grids).

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid.

Attribute.Name: disabledImage
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid when the action is not enabled (to make the button invisible, use a transparent image).

Attribute.Name: tooltip
Attribute.Description: Tooltip to appear in the grid.

Attribute.Name: condition
Attribute.Description: Condition to determine whether the action will be enabled. If the action is defined as "InGrid", the check will be performed for each record. If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: buttonClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the button (if no class is specified, the one set in the configuration file will be used).

Attribute.Name: EventCode
Attribute.Description: Código para o Evento da Action, somente para Action não Standard

Attribute.Name: CodeEnable
Attribute.Description: Evento adicionado a ação de habilitar a Action, Coringda {0} define o nome do controle

Attribute.Name: Position
Attribute.Description: Define a posição da action fora do Grid

Attribute.Name: Width
Attribute.Description: Define o Width da Coluna no Grid

Attribute.Name: GridWidth
Attribute.Description: Define o Width(tamanho horizontal)

Attribute.Name: GridHeight
Attribute.Description: Define o Height(tamanho vertical)

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption Text.

Attribute.Name: HTMLFormat
Attribute.Description: HTML Format

Attribute.Name: attributeDescription
Attribute.Description: Description Attribute.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Attribute description.

Attribute.Name: autolink
Attribute.Description: Automatically generate links to other pattern instances for description attributes and supertypes.

Attribute.Name: visible
Attribute.Description: Attribute is visible (if false, in grids the column will be hidden, and in tabular tabs the attribute will be invisible).

Attribute.Name: themeClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the attribute.

Attribute.Name: format
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Text;HTML;Raw HTML;Text with meaningful spaces}
Attribute.Description: HTML format for the attribute.

Attribute.Name: isValid
Attribute.Description: Evento IsValid para Atributo ou variável

Attribute.Name: required
Attribute.Description: Define como obrigatório atributo

Attribute.Name: requiredMessage
Attribute.Description: Define mensagem padrão para atributo obrigatório, Coringda {0} é a descrição do atributo

Attribute.Name: requiredAfterValidate
Attribute.Description: Define se aplica a regra error no AfterValidate ou não

Attribute.Name: rule
Attribute.Description: Define regra para atributo

Attribute.Name: valueRule
Attribute.Description: Define valor da regra para atributo

Attribute.Name: picture
Attribute.Description: Define a picture para o atributo

Attribute.Name: readonly
Attribute.Description: Define se é ReadOnly

Attribute.Name: eventValidation
Attribute.Description: Define código de Evento que será utilizado para validação do Atributo, Coringa {0} define o nome do atributo com SDT, {1} define o nome do atributo, {2} define a variavel Mode, {3} define a lista SDT do segundo nivel

Attribute.Name: EventStart
Attribute.Description: Define código para o Evento Start, coringa {0} define o valor e {1} define o controle em tela

Attribute.Name: MaskPicture
Attribute.Description: Define a Picture

Attribute.Name: Reverse
Attribute.Description: Define se a digitação será invertida

Attribute.Name: Signed
Attribute.Description: Define se permite valor negativo

Attribute.Name: UnmaskedChars
Attribute.Description: Define os caracteres que serão retirados quando retorna valor sem a mascara

Attribute.Name: UnmaskedValue
Attribute.Description: Define se retorna o valor sem a mascara ou não

Attribute.Name: Width
Attribute.Description: Define o Width(tamanho horizontal) para o Atributo

Attribute.Name: Height
Attribute.Description: Define o Height(tamanho vertical) para o Atributo

Attribute.Name: value
Attribute.Description: Filter Condition. Pode utilizar o coringa {0} que define o nome da variavel SDT com ponto

Attribute.Name: attribute
Attribute.Description: Attribute that represents the transaction. (For example: CustomerName for Customer).

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Attribute Description.

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Attribute or variable to be entered by the user and used in the conditions.

Attribute.Name: domain
Attribute.Description: Domain of the variable. Use only with variables, not necessary with attributes.

Attribute.Name: attribute
Attribute.Description: Attribute of the variable

Attribute.Name: default
Attribute.Description: Default value. Must be an expression of the same type of the attribute/variable.

Attribute.Name: allValue
Attribute.Description: Add an 'all' option in ComboBox. (Use only when the attribute is a ComboBox).

Attribute.Name: prompt
Attribute.Description: Prompt object used to get the possible values for this filter attribute.

Attribute.Name: isValid
Attribute.Description: Define o Evento isValid para a Variável de Filtro

Attribute.Name: filterType
Attribute.Description: Define se o filtro será Normal ou Intervalo(Valor Inicial e Final)

Attribute.Name: Width
Attribute.Description: Define o Width(tamanho horizontal) para o Atributo

Attribute.Name: Height
Attribute.Description: Define o Height(tamanho vertical) para o Atributo

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Level Name.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Level Description.

Attribute.Name: webpanelObject
Attribute.Description: Web Panel to link.

Attribute.Name: tooltip
Attribute.Description: Define o tooltip para a imagem de prompt

Attribute.Name: condition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can Open Prompt.

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Define a imagem a ser utilizada no prompt

Attribute.Name: type
Attribute.Description: Define o tipo do Link, Regra Prompt ou chamada com popup a partir de evento

Attribute.Name: Insert
Attribute.Description: Insert Mode.

Attribute.Name: Update
Attribute.Description: Update Mode.

Attribute.Name: Delete
Attribute.Description: Delete Mode.

Attribute.Name: Display
Attribute.Description: Display Mode.

Attribute.Name: Export
Attribute.Description: Export mode.

Attribute.Name: Legend
Attribute.Description: Legend mode.

Attribute.Name: InsertCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can insert records in the grid. If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: UpdateCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can update a record of the grid (the check will be performed for each record). If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: DeleteCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can delete a record of the grid (the check will be performed for each record). If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: DisplayCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can display (invoke the View for) a record of the grid (the check will be performed for each record). If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: ExportCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition evaluated to determine whether the user can export records in the grid and download them as an Excel spreadsheet. If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Order, for user selection.

Attribute.Name: ascending
Attribute.Description: Ascending Order.

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Parameter Name.

Attribute.Name: domain
Attribute.Description: Only needed for variables (defines their domain).

Attribute.Name: null
Attribute.Description: If set to false, the parameter value cannot change in Insert. (For example, if inserting a City in a given Country, CountryId doesn't change when calling City transaction).

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Literal to appear in the Form's caption (description is the default). If a literal, use quotes.

Attribute.Name: page
Attribute.Description: Number of rows in the grid per page (only for Grid type).

Attribute.Name: isMain
Attribute.Description: Set "Main Program" flag in selection webpanel.

Attribute.Name: masterPage
Attribute.Description: Object name of the master page to be used in this selection webpanel. To use the one defined in the configuration file, set value to "<default>". To disable the master page, use "<none>".

Attribute.Name: loadOnStart
Attribute.Description: Carrega Grid no Start, ou não somente quando clicar em procurar

Attribute.Name: requiredFilter
Attribute.Description: Define se será obrigatório informar pelo menos um filtro para pesquisa

Attribute.Name: requiredFilterMessage
Attribute.Description: Define a mensagem padrão para o filtro requerido

Attribute.Name: automaticRefresh
Attribute.Description: Automatic Refresh no Grid, pesquisa sem clicar no botão Pesquisar

Attribute.Name: filterCollapse
Attribute.Description: Utiliza Collapse/Expand para os Filtros da Selection

Attribute.Name: filterCollapseDefault
Attribute.Description: Carrega os Filtros por padrão Collapse

Attribute.Name: setFocus
Attribute.Description: Define Foco no primeiro atributo de filtro

Attribute.Name: setFocusAttribute
Attribute.Description: Define Foco no primeiro atributo de filtro

Attribute.Name: objName
Attribute.Description: Object Name

Attribute.Name: SearchEventCode
Attribute.Description: Define Código para o Evento Search

Attribute.Name: CurrentPageCombo
Attribute.Description: CurrentPage ComboBox para seleção do número da pagina

Attribute.Name: SubCode
Attribute.Description: Define Sub para utilização neste objeto

Attribute.Name: CallMethod
Attribute.Description: Define o metodo de chamada ao cadastro, Link ou Popup Modal

Attribute.Name: EventStart
Attribute.Description: Define código para o Evento Start

Attribute.Name: Identifier
Attribute.Description: Define o identificador de registro no grid

Attribute.Name: updateObject
Attribute.Type: enum{Do not update;Create default;Only Rules, Events and Conditions;Overwrite}
Attribute.Description: Do not update - Não atualiza o Objecto Create default - Atualiza o Objeto e mantem o código atual Only Rules, Events and Conditions - Atualiza somente as regras, eventos e condições e mantem o código atual Overwrite - Atualiza o objeto sobrescrevendo o código atual

Attribute.Name: updateExport
Attribute.Type: enum{Do not update;Create default;Overwrite}
Attribute.Description: Do not update - Não atualiza o Objecto Create default - Atualiza o Objeto e mantem o código atual Overwrite - Atualiza o objeto sobrescrevendo o código atual

Attribute.Name: updateSDT
Attribute.Type: enum{Do not update;Create default;Overwrite}
Attribute.Description: Do not update - Não atualiza o Objecto Create default - Atualiza o Objeto e mantem o código atual Overwrite - Atualiza o objeto sobrescrevendo o código atual

Attribute.Name: CustomRender
Attribute.Description: Use a custom user control for rendering grids. Applies to all selection and grid tab objects.

Attribute.Description: Define o AutoResize para o Grid

Attribute.Description: Define o Width(tamanho horizontal) para o Grid

Attribute.Description: Define o Height(tamanho vertical) para o Grid

Attribute.Name: AllowSelection
Attribute.Description: Define o AllowSelection para o Grid

Attribute.Name: page
Attribute.Description: Number of rows in the grid per page (only for Grid type).

Attribute.Description: Set "Main Program" flag in selection webpanel.

Attribute.Name: masterPage
Attribute.Description: Object name of the master page to be used in this selection webpanel. To use the one defined in the configuration file, set value to "<default>". To disable the master page, use "<none>".

Attribute.Description: Internal name. Must be unique.

Attribute.Description: Não permite quantidade de itens em branco na Aba com Grid do WebPanel com BC

Attribute.Name: listNotNullMessage

Attribute.Name: listNotNullCondition
Attribute.Description: Define Condição para verificar a quantidade de itens no item, se não informado o padrão é 'not temItens', coringa {0} é a variavel SDT do primeiro nivel

Attribute.Description: Define Sub para utilização neste objeto

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption to Appear in the Form. Must be a character expression. Usually it's the description attribute.

Attribute.Name: backToSelection
Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the View page has a link back to the Selection page.

Attribute.Name: masterPage
Attribute.Description: Object name of the master page to be used in this view webpanel. To use the one defined in the configuration file, set value to "<default>". To disable the master page, use "<none>".

Attribute.Name: useAsSearchViewer
Attribute.Description: Set the view object as the Search Viewer for the associated transaction.

Attribute.Name: objName
Attribute.Description: Object Name

Attribute.Name: disabledTabsIfEditing
Attribute.Description: Desabilita outras abas quando esta editando registro de outro nivel
